ok so Iâ€™ll explain this real quick
it will only be Pre-roll (at the start of someone watching only) instead of every X minutes
its simple you ask your viewers to get an adblock

when you become a twitch affiliate, prerolls are enabled automatically and cannot be turned off. however, you can run an ad break to disable prerolls for a specific amount of time. 1 min ad break -> 20 mins disabled prerolls. 3 min ad break - 60 mins disabled prerolls.
Bube gaming
it really sucks but running ad breaks are the only way to disable prerolls
channel points come with affialiate which comes with ads
I run a 3 min ad break right when I start stream for that reason
also you have Emotes Slots and the ability to have people sub to you
max time you can disable prerolls for is 1 hour btw. so you canâ€™t spam ad breaks to have prerolls last for the entire stream
